Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.PlayerController

  • public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Player controller operating on the board during a game.
    Author:
    Maha Malik, Kacper Lisikiewicz, Stefani Dimitrova
